thread.title: BRIEF-Air Canada Announces The Pricing Of A Canadian Dollar Private Offering Of Enhanced Equipment Trust Certificates

title: BRIEF-Air Canada Announces The Pricing Of A Canadian Dollar Private Offering Of Enhanced Equipment Trust Certificates

organizations.name: enhanced equipment trust certificates reuters staff

text: 31 AM / in 11 minutes BRIEF-Air Canada Announces The Pricing Of A Canadian Dollar Private Offering Of Enhanced Equipment Trust Certificates Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Feb 26 (Reuters) - Air Canada: * AIR CANADA ANNOUNCES THE PRICING OF A CANADIAN DOLLAR PRIVATE OFFERING OF ENHANCED EQUIPMENT TRUST CERTIFICATES * AIR CANADA - ‍TWO TRANCHES OF RATED CERTIFICATES, HAVE COMBINED AGGREGATE FACE AMOUNT OF ABOUT $301 MILLION, WEIGHTED AVERAGE INTEREST RATE OF 3.76%​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
